channel.title: CFG files and Excel
channel.description:
Knowledge: None
Requirements: Microsoft Office (Can be downloaded from thepiratebay(but you didn't hear it from me))
Step 1: Open up excel
Step 2: Drag CFG file onto excel screen
Step 3: Edit how you want and save.(????)
Step 4: Profit.
Reason why I wrote this: Because I just discovered you can do this and I though y'all might like to know too as it is very handy and convenient.
It is handy because it lines up all your columns and rows properly making for easy editing. Also when you save it it puts just 1 tab between each thing and doesn't put any fancy format so server can still read.

It is handy because it lines up all your columns and rows properly making for easy editing. Also when you save it it puts just 1 tab between each thing and doesn’t put any fancy format so server can still read.
